item.title: Set up a Hadoop Spark cluster in 10 minutes with Vagrant
item.description: With each of the big 3 Hadoop vendors - Cloudera, Hortonworks and MapR each providing their own Hadoop sandbox virtual machines (VMs), trying out Hadoop today has become extremely easy. For a developer, it is extremely useful to download a get started with one of these VMs and try out Hadoop to practiceÂ data science right away. [caption id=“attachment_183” align=“alignnone” width=“326”] Set up a Hadoop-Spark cluster with Vagrant in 10 minutes[/caption]
